jobs.title: VP of Sales
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Topline Pro

We’re building AI powered Shopify for service businesses. We help service pros (e.g., roofers, landscapers, painters, cleaners) acquire direct business, fast. Up and running within minutes using Gen AI, our digital storefront products help pros get discovered, trusted, and booked repeatedly.

Topline Pro is co-founded by Nick Ornitz (CEO) and Shannon Kay (CPO) with a team of 70+ a-players with plans to expand more in 2025. We serve thousands of local service businesses and were named as one of the 2023 and 2024 top 50 Tech Companies building for SMBs.

We're well funded with over $44M of capital raised from YC, Northzone, Forerunner, Bonfire, TMV and BBG. Most recently we closed our $27M Series B in Summer 2025. We have several years of runway, and we’ve experienced rapid growth in the past year. We’re further scaling our Sales team (25 today) and looking for an leader who can further build on our foundation and scale the team.

We believe “great candidates” do not come about through simply a checkmark next to past experiences. We believe in hiring people not just skills. Even if you do not check every box but find excitement at the prospect of working with us in this capacity, please apply.

⚡ What you'll do

  • Own all aspects of revenue generation with aggressive growth targets on the journey post 8 figures of ARR

  • Focus on engaging and upselling our rapidly growing customer base growing of thousands of home service SMBs

  • Plan and lead recruiting for team expansion from our existing team

  • Exceed quarterly sales team quotas by holding your team accountable for activities that lead to revenue generation

  • Meet with with our existing Pro customer base and potential customers in order to driving meaningful relationships that contribute to the customer experience and revenue to our bottom line

  • Build, develop, and inspire an organization of hard-working team members and leaders by creating scalable, data-driven sales processes

  • Develop, test, implement and refine growth and acquisition strategies through data backed decisions

🎯 What we're looking for

  • 10+ years experience in B2B SaaS sales (required to have SMB sales experience)

  • 5+ years in SMB sales management

  • Demonstrated experience leading, building, and growing successful, collaborative, and hard-working sales teams of 10+ Account Executives

  • Comfortable getting into the trenches with the team when required- reaching out to cold leads through multiple communications channels (phone, email, etc.)

  • Technical proficiency and experience managing full sales tech stack (e.g., Orum, Salesloft, Hubspot, etc.)

  • Not just willing but excited to work in person 5 days per week in our Brooklyn office

🤗 Who you are

  • Competitive with a desire to win

  • Team player with a passion for learning

  • Self-starter who finds comfort in ambiguity

🙌 What we offer

  • Competitive cash compensation - Base Salary $150-200K + bonus/equity package

  • Full Medical, Dental and Vision Health Coverage

  • Computer and workspace enhancements

  • Monthly stipend for mental and physical health

  • 401(k) plan (non-matching)

  • Unlimited vacation, 7 company holidays including election day, and 1 personal volunteer day a year

  • Opportunity to take on significant responsibility and ownership in scaling a product that can change the lives of home service pros

We’re building AI powered Shopify for service businesses. We help service pros (e.g., roofers, landscapers, painters, cleaners) acquire direct business, fast. Up and running within minutes using Gen AI, our digital storefront products help pros get discovered, trusted, and booked repeatedly.

Topline Pro is co-founded by Nick Ornitz (CEO) and Shannon Kay (CPO) with an excellent team of 70+ rockstars with plans to expand more in 2025. We serve thousands of local service businesses and were named as one of the 2023 and 2024 top 50 Tech Companies building for SMBs.

We're YC-backed and well funded with several years of runway, and we’ve experienced rapid growth in the past year. We're in a phenomenal position to scale—with the financial foundation, product-market fit, and momentum to go big. You’ll be joining at an inflection point—where the groundwork is laid and the path to massive impact is clear.

We are hiring a Senior Data Analyst to be a key partner to our go-to-market teams and leadership. This role is focused on turning raw data into robust systems that will grow and scale while supporting GTM teams and senior leadership with actionable insights. By building a reliable reporting layer on top of our existing data sources, you’ll help drive growth, improve visibility, and create the foundation for sustainable scaling.

⚡ What you'll do

  • Build scalable data pipelines and integrate diverse data sources to deliver accurate, reliable foundations for analysis and insights

  • Define semantic layers and deploy analytics models that enable consistency, trust, and power self-serve insights

  • Design and maintain reporting layers, KPI reporting, and dashboards that track growth, performance, and evolve with the business to support long-term decision making.

  • Partner with senior leaders and cross-functional stakeholders to identify pain points, define and deliver on metrics that drive business decisions

  • Play a key role in shaping the data function by establishing best practices and helping grow the team

🎯 What we’re looking for

  • Minimum of 5 years of industry experience, with the leadership mindset to help set the stage for future hiring

  • Proficiency in a BI tool either Hex or Looker

  • Strong SQL skills with experience in Snowflake and dbt

  • Background supporting or working within a SaaS environment

  • Proven ability to manage stakeholders, with excellent cross-functional communication and presentation skills

  • Ability to translate complex technical concepts into clear insights for non-technical audiences

  • Comfort working in ambiguity and proactively driving clarity and solutions

🤗 Who you are

You are a curious and proactive problem solver who thrives at the intersection of data and business. You enjoy working closely with cross-functional teams, asking the right questions, and turning raw data into clear, actionable insights. You’re equally comfortable diving deep into SQL and dbt as you are presenting findings to stakeholders & senior leaders in a way that drives alignment and action. Ambiguity doesn’t slow you down — you see it as an opportunity to bring clarity and structure. Most of all, you’re excited by the chance to be a foundational member of a growing data team, helping to shape how the company uses data to scale and succeed.

🤝 Our Values

  • No Bullsh*t: We create meaningful results for our customers and drive growth for our team—ensuring progress and impact are felt every day. Our focus, both internally and externally, is on delivering genuine value rather than superficial solutions or benefit without purpose.

  • Think Big, Learn Fast: We move quickly, acting on data to uncover insights and solutions. We embrace risks, knowing every experiment fuels growth—even when it doesn’t go as planned.

  • One Team, One Dream: We tackle challenges together with creativity, and an open mind—always seeking solutions and embracing fresh ideas to win as a team.

  • Empower Every Voice: We welcome diverse perspectives and bold ideas, creating space for authenticity and respect—because great ideas come from everywhere.

  • Be an Owner: We take responsibility for outcomes, act in the company’s best interest, and treat every dollar as our own. We move with urgency, think long-term, and take pride in driving impact.

  • Boom!: We take time to celebrate each other’s achievements, big and small—at work and in life—because shared success fuels lasting momentum. And we end all team meetings in a “Boom!”

🙌 What we offer

  • Competitive Compensation package

  • Full Medical, Dental, and Vision Health Coverage

  • Computer and workspace enhancements

  • 401(k) plan (non-matching)

  • Unlimited vacation, 9 company holidays including election day, and 1 personal volunteer day a year

  • Company-paid Wellhub membership for fitness and wellness

  • Dinner covered with Uber Eats + a stocked kitchen to keep you fueled

  • Opportunity to take on significant responsibility and ownership in scaling a product that can change the lives of home service pros

You’ll be joining at an inflection point—where the groundwork is laid and the path to massive impact is clear.

📣 Role Summary

We're hiring a Staff Analytics Engineer to take ownership of how data is modeled, organized, and scaled at Topline Pro. You'll be responsible for building the data assets that sit at the core of our business—turning information from systems like Stripe, Twilio, Dialpad, Salesloft, HubSpot, and others into clean, trustworthy data models. Your work will give teams across the company confidence in the numbers and the ability to make better, faster decisions.

This is a senior, hands-on role at the intersection of engineering, analytics, and business strategy. You'll shape the way data flows through the company and ensure we have the right foundation to measure performance, experiment, and grow.

⚡ What you'll do

  • Own and champion centralized data assets that serve as the source of truth for answering the company's most important operational questions.

  • Develop scalable, well-designed data models in dbt and Snowflake that enable performant analysis across SaaS-scale datasets.

  • Work deeply with Stripe data to ensure accurate modeling of payments, subscriptions, revenue, and related financial flows.

  • Codify and democratize best practices for SQL optimization, query reusability, and reporting, ensuring consistency and efficiency across the team.

  • Define and enforce team-wide standards for coding, documentation, testing, monitoring, and code reviews to keep our pipelines robust and maintainable.

  • Lead the technical execution of high-complexity BI and analytics projects, taking them from design through to production.

  • Design scalable data architectures with strong modeling practices, clear governance, and a focus on data quality.

  • Collaborate with teams across the business—from engineering and product to sales and customer success—to understand their needs and deliver high-impact solutions.

🎯 What we’re looking for

  • 8+ years of experience working as a Analytics Engineer, BI Engineer, Data Visualization Engineer or related role

  • Direct experience working in SaaS or closely related industries (e.g., cloud platforms, cybersecurity, productivity software, etc.)

  • Extensive experience in Snowflake and dbt

  • Deep knowledge of advanced SQL concepts, including window functions, CTEs, and nested queries

  • Strong understanding of Stripe data models (i.e, payments, subscriptions) and how to build reliable analytics from them

  • Hands-on experience with BI/visualization tools (Hex, Looker, or similar)

  • Proven track record of building centralized fact tables and data systems that are efficient, reliable, and scalable

  • Mindset focused on accuracy, clarity, and usability—creating systems that make data meaningful and easy to trust

🎯 Bonus points if you…

  • Have experience with Heap or similar product analytics tools

  • Are familiar with RevOps and CX data stacks (HubSpot, Salesloft, Twilio, Dialpad)

  • Bring previous startup or high-growth SaaS experience

🤝 How You Work — Living Our Core Values

At Topline Pro, we’re not just hiring for skills — we’re hiring people who embody our core values in how they work, collaborate, and build. Here’s what that looks like in this role:

  • No Bullsh*t: You value clarity, directness, and real impact. You speak plainly, cut through complexity, and focus on what matters. You don’t posture — you solve. Your work and communication are honest, transparent, and rooted in what’s best for the team and our customers.

  • Think Big, Learn Fast: You’re energized by ambitious goals and unafraid to tackle messy, ambiguous problems. You take an iterative approach — testing, learning, and improving quickly. You value momentum over perfection and believe that learning happens fastest through building and doing.

  • One Team, One Dream: You win by working together. You collaborate with empathy, celebrate shared wins, and show up for your teammates — especially when things get hard. You believe trust, respect, and shared ownership are the foundation of great teams.

  • Empower Every Voice: You seek input from others and value different perspectives — especially when building systems that serve multiple teams. You communicate clearly, listen actively, and make it easy for others to contribute. You care about outcomes that serve everyone, not just your lane.

  • Be an Owner: You take responsibility for outcomes, not just tasks. You act in the company’s best interest — driving meaningful results, moving with urgency, and treating every dollar and decision like it’s your own. You don’t wait for permission; you see problems and take action.

  • BOOM!: You take pride in doing great work and lift others up when they do the same. You believe celebration fuels momentum. Whether it’s a major launch or a quick win

🙌 What we offer

  • Full Medical, Dental, and Vision Health Coverage

  • Computer and workspace enhancements

  • Monthly stipend for mental and physical health

  • 401(k) plan (non-matching)

  • Unlimited vacation, 9 company holidays including election day, and 1 personal volunteer day a year

  • Company-paid Wellhub membership for fitness and wellness

  • Dinner covered with Uber Eats + a stocked kitchen to keep you fuele

  • Opportunity to take on significant responsibility and ownership in scaling a product that can change the lives of home service pros

  • Fun-filled team that doesn’t take themselves too seriously, including virtual cameos from the team dog mascots Caro and Alta
